remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含用于与配置设置衔接的静态方法。The class contains static methods for interfacing with configuration settings. 方法允许开发人员可以配置远程处理基础结构通过使用 XML 格式配置文件。The method allows developers to configure the remoting infrastructure through the use of XML formatted configuration files. 类还包含几种方法的客户端的客户端和服务器端注册和激活的服务器对象的驻留在服务器上。The class also contains several methods for client-end and server-end registration of client and server activated objects that reside on the server. 类提供了许多方法，以帮助中使用和发布远程对象。The class provides a number of methods to help in using and publishing remoted objects. 方法提供用于存储所需激活并远程对象的实例中与之通信的所有相关信息的功能为更高版本的序列化和传输到远程位置的类。The method provides the functionality for storing all the relevant information required to activate and communicate with a remote object in an instance of the class for later serialization and transmission to a remote location. 方法可反转此过程中，创建可由应用程序而不考虑任何远程处理分支的远程对象的代理。The method reverses this process, creating a proxy for a remote object that can be used by an application without regard for any remoting subdivisions. 类包含激活并与其远程对象所需的所有相关信息。The class holds all the relevant information required to activate and communicate with a remote object. 此类是传输到远程位置使用一个通道，其中是取消封送的对象的可序列化表示 (请参阅) 和用于创建进行远程处理的对象的本地代理。This class is a serializable representation of an object that is transmitted to a remote location using a channel, where it is unmarshaled (see ) and can be used to create a local proxy of the remoted object. > [!NOTE] > 由引用封送的对象 (Mbr) 不是驻留在内存永久。Marshal-by-reference objects (MBRs) do not reside in memory forever. 相反，除非类型替代若要控制其自己的生存期策略，每个 MBR 都具有有限的生存时间之前的.NET Framework 远程处理系统开始的过程中删除它并回收内存。Instead, unless the type overrides to control its own lifetime policies, each MBR has a finite lifetime before the .NET Framework remoting system begins the process of deleting it and reclaiming the memory. 有关详细信息，请参阅[生存期租约](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23bk23zc.aspx)。For more information, see [Lifetime Leases](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23bk23zc.aspx).
